### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) 
-  Chest (position x=44.5, y=-81.5) 
-  Chest (position x=45.5, y=-80.5) 
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-79.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
-  Make sure to empty the chest at the specified position to continue extracting items
### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has sufficient fuel to continue mining
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has sufficient space in the destination chest to continue inserting items
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue inserting items
